::Feline::

She looks at DevilDuer and purrs. She takes her drink and sips it. 
"I like it just fine."
She moved her tail and touched the tip of DevilDuer's nose.  She 
moved in her seat and recrossd her legs. She set the glass down and 
looked at Zardus. "You have a fine ship here."
She took another sip from her glass.  
She looked at DevilDuer and spoke in a soft tone, "and a handsome 
crew."

She finished her glass and stood up.  She went and got herself 
another drink.  She got another one for Zardus. She leaned forward 
quite a bit while handing him is drink, letting him catch a glimps, 
then stood up and returned to her chair. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/Reptilica/DevilDuer::
> 
> Zardus frowns as Feline walks off to sit down at a table, 
obvioustly 
> expecting him to give her a drink. While he didn't mind her 
touching him, he 
> did mind having to work for other bots. Zardus walks over to the 
food 
> replicator, making two drinks, which he carries off to the table.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica grins as Zardus places one of the drinks in front of 
Feline. He 
> chuckles quetly. "Gee, none for us, Zardus?" he says, still 
chuckling, "I'm 
> offended."
> 
> Zardus growls at the other bot, the threatening look in the 
Alliance 
> commander's eyes shutting Reptilica up. "I trust you have other 
duties, 
> Reptilica."
> 
> Reptilica shakes his head. "Nope, I'm on break."
> 
> "Good," Zardus says, his voice threatening, "Then you can clean the 
mechfluid 
> out of the torture chambers."
> 
> Reptilica sighs, getting up and walking off. Zardus sits down in 
his seat, 
> putting his own drink on the table.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer chuckles at the scene between Zardus and Reptilica, 
leaning closer 
> to Feline.
> 
> "So," he says, trying to start conversation, "How do you like the 
Alliance so 
> far?"
